SENSORSET.NAME: Stanford MITes Set 1
SENSORSET.DESCRIPTION: This set requires 2 receivers to be running. Receiver 1 expects data from MITes 0,1,4 and 7. Receiver 2 expects data from MITes 8, 11, 14 and 17.

SENSORSET.NAME: Stanford MITes Set 2
SENSORSET.DESCRIPTION: This set requires 2 receivers to be running. Receiver 1 expects data from MITes 0 and 1. Receiver 2 expects data from MITes 11 and 17.
